name: Haemophilia
0:
”Alexa, open haemo philia”
”Alexa, open haemo philia and test”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haemo philia
des:
Haemophilia is a group of hereditary genetic disorders that impact the body's ability to control blood clotting which is used to stop bleeding when a blood vessel is broken. This skill makes an attempt to approximate Haemophilia presence in a baby by taking input Haemophilia condition of parents. Father can be diseased or normal and mother can be diseased or normal or carrier of Haemophilia.
Disclaimer - This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
